page.title: 18INDUSTRY
page.content: The Industrial Estate is on the edge of Huntly and is near the by-pass so that the heavy lorries will not congest the town centre.There are 12 different factories on the Industrial Estate.For example:Agricultural Engineers,Joinery and House Building,Engineering(some for oil-rigs),Egg packing,Road Depot and Petrol Depot.One old,established family industry is Rizza's for making ice-cream.They produce 1000 gallons of ice-cream a day (it depends on the weather).There are 15 people working at Rizza's.They produce 40 000 ice lollies a week.They supply 300 to 400 shops around Scotland.Another business in Huntly is Spences who make jumpers under the name of Jaeger.125 people work at Spences.They produce 6000 top quality Jaeger jumpers a week.
